鏡湖.definition: Jinghu, a district of Wuhu City 蕪湖市|芜湖市[Wu2hu2 Shi4], Anhui

鏡湖區.definition: Jinghu, a district of Wuhu City 蕪湖市|芜湖市[Wu2hu2 Shi4], Anhui

鏡花水月.definition: lit. flowers in a mirror and the moon reflected in the lake (idiom); fig. an unrealistic rosy view; viewing things through rose-tinted spectacles; also written 水月鏡花|水月镜花

鏡花緣.definition: Jinghua Yuan or Flowers in the Mirror, Qing novel of fantasy and erudition (early 19th century) by Li Ruzhen 李汝珍[Li3 Ru3 zhen1]

鏡頭.definition: camera lens; camera shot (in a movie etc); scene
